titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Deputy and Council, for setting apart Thursday the 14th day of October next, as a day of solemn fasting and humiliation throughout this nation, with the grounds and reasons thereof.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1658-1659 : Cromwell)
Cromwell, Henry, 1628-1674.

notesStmt.note: At head of text: H. Cromwell.
Dated at end: At the Council-chamber in Dublin, the 24 day of September, 1658.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
